internal_metrics.notes: Initial onboarding month. Hours reflect setup and initial consultations. Adherence is not yet applicable.
First full month of plan implementation. Coaching hours increased for support during travel. Adherence impacted by business trip.
Adherence dipped due to travel and plan complexity, prompting a strategy review. Doctor hours include test result analysis.
Increased adherence following a check-in from senior leadership and plan adjustments. Introduction of supplements.
Significant improvement in adherence, motivated by positive and tangible biomarker results. Member engagement is high.
Focus on long-term planning. Doctor hours reflect comprehensive review and discussion of future health strategy.
High and stable adherence. Member is proactively inquiring about advanced health topics, increasing engagement.
Transition to self-management. Coaching hours are reduced as member demonstrates independence. Final review and transition call.
